pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, February 27, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Room 225A
West Block
Parliament Hill

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister, Minister of Seniors Filomena Tassi, and Member of Parliament for Hamilton Eastâ€“Stoney Creek Bob Bratina will meet with Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of ArcelorMittal Lakshmi Mittal.

Closed to media.
